type.title: Type
type.description: Defines the type of the client extension

baseURL.description: The base path from which all of the client extension’s defined resources are served.

name.title: Name
name.description: The client extension’s name (as it appears in the UI). A name is required for front-end client extensions.

sourceCodeURL.title: Source Code URL
sourceCodeURL.description: The address to the client extension’s source repository.

CustomElement.title: Custom Element Client Extension
CustomElement.description: Custom element defines CSS and JavaScript resources that will be rendered into a provided HTML <custom-element>. This provides full integration with the Liferay host page. Each custom element client extension is made available as a widget.
CustomElement.x-intellij-html-description: Custom element defines CSS and JavaScript resources that will be rendered into a provided HTML <custom-element>. This provides full integration with the Liferay host page. Each custom element client extension is made available as a widget. Learn more about custom element client extensions.

htmlElementName.title: HTML Element Name
htmlElementName.description: The HTML element name that refers to the custom element, which is rendered in the page markup.

useESM.title: Use ES Modules
useESM.description: Whether the JavaScript code uses ESM format. When true, the JavaScript is added to the page with the type="module" property.

urls.title: JavaScript URL
urls.description: List of paths to JavaScript resources that are added to the HTML head when the widget is used on a page. One of these resources must contain the custom element initialization code. This combines with baseURL to form a complete URL.

cssURLs.title: CSS URL
cssURLs.description: List of CSS paths added to the HTML head when the custom element is used on a page.

instanceable.title: Instanceable
instanceable.description: Whether the custom element widget can appear multiple times on a page.

portletCategoryName.title: Portlet Category Name
portletCategoryName.description: The menu category of the custom element widget.

friendlyURLMapping.title: Friendly URL Mapping
friendlyURLMapping.description: Mapping of a friendly URL prefix to the specific custom element widget.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Properties to append as attributes to the custom HTML element. They use a newline as a separator and are processed as Java properties.

FdsCellRenderer.title: Frontend data set cell renderer Client Extension
FdsCellRenderer.description: Frontend data set cell renderer defines a JavaScript function that can render a frontend data set cell content.

GlobalCSS.title: CSS Client Extension
GlobalCSS.description: CSS defines a CSS resource that will be included after theme CSS resources.

url.title: URL
url.description: The path to the JavaScript file added to the HEAD of the page when the client extension is enabled. The complete URI is prefixed by the baseURL value.

GlobalJS.title: JavaScript Client Extension
GlobalJS.description: JS defines a JavaScript resource that will be included after theme JavaScript resources.

url.title: JavaScript URL
url.description: The path to the JavaScript file added to the HEAD of the page when the client extension is enabled. The complete URI is prefixed by the baseURL value.

IFrame.title: IFrame Client Extension
IFrame.description: IFrame defines an application URL that will be rendered into an <iframe> element. This provides limited integration with the host page using Liferay's optional client SDK API. Each IFrame client extension is made available as a widget.
IFrame.x-intellij-html-description: IFrame defines an application URL that will be rendered into an <iframe> element. This provides limited integration with the host page using Liferay's optional client SDK API. Each IFrame client extension is made available as a widget. Learn more about IFrame client extensions.

friendlyURLMapping.title: Friendly URL Mapping
friendlyURLMapping.description: The mapping of a friendly URL prefix to the specific IFrame widget.

portletCategoryName.title: Widget Category Name
portletCategoryName.description: The menu category of the IFrame widget.

url.title: URL
url.description: The complete URL to the HTML page to embed within the IFrame widget.

instanceable.title: Instanceable
instanceable.description: Whether the IFrame widget can appear multiple times on a page.

JSImportMapsEntry.description: JS Importmaps Entry defines a JavaScript module to be exported through the import maps as a bare identifier. Please make sure to reload the page to update your current browser's import maps after publishing this client extension.

StaticContent.title: Static content
StaticContent.description: Static content defines a URL containing static content.

ThemeCSS.title: Theme CSS Client Extension
ThemeCSS.description: Theme CSS defines CSS resources to override those provided by the theme.

clayURL.title: Clay CSS URL
clayURL.description: The path to the CSS file representing the clay.css file of a Liferay theme. The complete URI is prefixed by the baseURL value.

mainURL.title: Main CSS URL
mainURL.description: The path to the CSS file representing the main.css file of a Liferay theme. The complete URI is prefixed by the baseURL value.

ThemeFavicon.title: Theme Favicon Client Extension
ThemeFavicon.description: Favicon defines an icon resource to override the favicon provided by the theme.

url.title: URL
url.description: The path to the icon image file. The complete URI is prefixed by the baseURL value.

ThemeJS.title: Theme JavaScript Client Extension
ThemeJS.description: Theme JavaScript defines a JavaScript resource to override the one provided by the theme.

url.title: URL
url.description: The path to the JavaScript file that is added to the HEAD of the page. The complete URI is prefixed by the baseURL value.

ThemeSpritemap.title: Theme Sprite Map Client Extension
ThemeSpritemap.description: Theme SVG defines a spritemap resource containing icons to override those provided by the theme.

url.title: URL
url.description: A path to the .svg sprite map that replaces the one for your existing Liferay theme. The complete URI is prefixed by the baseURL value.

resourcePath.description: The path to the object action handler. This value is combined with the OAuth2 application profile’s homePageURL value for a complete URL.

oAuth2ApplicationExternalReferenceCode.description: The external reference code for an OAuth2 application profile, needed for securing requests.

resourcePath.description: The path to the workflow action handler. This value is combined with the OAauth2 application profile’s homePageURL value for a complete URL.

oAuth2ApplicationExternalReferenceCode.description: The external reference code for an OAuth2 application profile, needed for securing requests.

resourcePath.description: The path to the notification handler. This value is combined with the OAauth2 application profile’s homePageURL value for a complete URL

oAuth2ApplicationExternalReferenceCode.description: The external reference code for an OAuth2 application profile, needed for securing requests.

homePageURL.description: The base address of the OAuth2 application profile’s resource server.

privacyPolicyURL.description: The URL for the OAuth2 application profile’s privacy policy.

scopes.description: An array of scopes that are associated with the OAuth2 application profile.

homePageURL.description: The base address of the OAuth2 application profile’s resource server.

privacyPolicyURL.description: The URL for the OAuth2 application profile’s privacy policy.

scopes.description: An array of scopes that are associated with the OAuth2 application profile.

userAccountEmailAddress.description: The email address for the user account associated with this OAuth2 application profile. This is only used if the userAccountScreenName property is undefined.

userAccountScreenName.description: The screen name for the user account associated with the OAuth2 application profile. This overrides the value for userAccountEmailAddress.

oAuthApplicationHeadlessServer.description: The identity (externalReferenceCode) of an OAuth2 application headless server profile.
